about_the_game:
While others charge head on, Rebel spy Cassian Andor moves in stealth to topple the Empire. Play as characters from the new series Andor, in LEGO-style.

Characters Include:

Cassian Andor (Andor)
Luthen Rael
Syril Karn
Supervisor Dedra Meero
Bix Caleen
detailed_description:
While others charge head on, Rebel spy Cassian Andor moves in stealth to topple the Empire. Play as characters from the new series Andor, in LEGO-style.

Characters Include:

Cassian Andor (Andor)
Luthen Rael
Syril Karn
Supervisor Dedra Meero
Bix Caleen

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti or Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 or AMD Ryzen 3 3100
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 780 or Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: While others charge head on, Rebel spy Cassian Andor moves in stealth to topple the Empire. Play as characters from the new series Andor, in LEGO-style.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic, Danish, Dutch, Korean, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
